title: Health Research Data Analyst
text:
I work at the intersection of public health, health research, and data analysis.
My focus is on: - Clinical and public health data analysis - Health data visualization using R - Evidence generation for health and Ayush research



Analyze large health datasets (NFHS, NSSO, HMIS)
Translate data into meaningful public health insights
Create clear, interpretable visualizations for research and policy

title: Projects
text:
Research question:
Who uses AYUSH services in India, and what are the socioeconomic patterns?
Data: NSSO 79th Round
Tools: R, ggplot2



AYUSH utilization varies by residence and education
Clear regional differences were observed

title: About Me
text:
I am a public health professional with training in AYUSH systems and a strong interest in health research and data-driven evidence generation.
My work focuses on: - Analyzing clinical and population-level health data - Supporting research through robust analysis and visualization - Bridging traditional medicine research with modern public health methods
I am currently building a portfolio of health data analysis projects and exploring opportunities in research and applied public health analytics.
